means.word_mean: 简单地; 简易地; 朴素地

sentences.en: To put it simply, the new proposals mean that the average worker will be about 10% better paid.
sentences.cn: 简单地说, 新建议意味着一个普通工人的工资将增加10%。

sentences.en: They dressed neatly and simply.
sentences.cn: 他们衣着整洁朴素。

sentences.en: I have never met our new neighbours; I simply know them by sight.
sentences.cn: 我从未接触过我们的新邻居, 只见过面。

sentences.en: What we need is simply money, money and money.
sentences.cn: 我们所需的仅仅是钱而已。

sentences.en: The drink consists simply of fresh oranges.
sentences.cn: 这饮料仅含新鲜橘汁。

sentences.en: I don't like driving; I do it simply because I have to get to work each day.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢开车, 只是因为我每天必须开车上班。

means.word_mean: 〈非正〉实在, 简直, 非常

sentences.en: My brother's English pronunciation is simply terrible.
sentences.cn: 我兄弟的英语发音实在糟透了。

sentences.en: It is simply ridiculous to attempt such a thing.
sentences.cn: 试图干这种事, 简直可笑。

sentences.en: The meat was so tough that I simply couldn't get it down.
sentences.cn: 这肉太老了, 我简直咽不下去。

sentence.cn: 但是一旦我开始，我就无法放下它。
sentence.en: But once I started,  I simply couldn't put it down.
sentence.from: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

sentence.cn: 但是，当它工作时，它相当美丽。
sentence.en: However,  when it works,  it is simply beautiful.

means.word_mean: 只有,纯粹地,完全地,绝对地,肯定地
明显地,清楚地,显而易见地
诚实地,质朴地,天真地,自然地

entry.def: You use simply to emphasize that something consists of only one thing, happens for only one reason, or is done in only one way.
entry.tran: 简单地;只不过;仅仅;纯粹

example.ex: The table is simply a chipboard circle on a base...
example.tran: 这张桌子只不过是在底座上安了一块圆形刨花板。

example.ex: Most of the damage that's occurred was simply because of fallen trees...
example.tran: 目前大部分损坏都是因为倒下的树木造成的。

entry.def: You use simply to emphasize what you are saying.

example.ex: This sort of increase simply cannot be justified...
example.tran: 这种增长根本就不合理。

example.ex: So many of these questions simply don't have answers...
example.tran: 这些问题有很多根本就没有答案。

sentences.sentence: "it is simply a matter of time"

means.word_mean: 3. in a simple manner; without extravagance or embellishment;

sentences.cn: 只需加上热水搅动就行。
sentences.en: Simply add hot water and stir.

sentences.cn: 所谓跑道不过是一长条草地而已。
sentences.en: The runway is simply a strip of grass.

sentences.cn: 成名常常是身在其位，恰逢其时，仅此而已。
sentences.en: Fame is often simply a matter of being in the right place at the right time.

sentences.en: You can enjoy all the water sports, or simply lie on the beach.

sentences.en: You simply must see the play.

sentences.en: The view is simply wonderful!

sentences.cn: 那根本不是真的！
sentences.en: That is simply not true!

sentences.en: I haven't seen her for simply ages.

sentences.en: The book explains grammar simply and clearly.

sentences.cn: 这些问题有很多根本就没有答案。

sentences.en: A CFL cannot be simply installed in an incandescent fixture and then expected to produce a visual appearance that is more than washed out, foggy, and dim.

sentences.en: Simply speaking , an architect's work is to construct the inhabitance and activity space for human beings.

sentences.en: In addition, the paper has simply introduced the planning process of indoor coverage.

Sentence.sentence: Does assisted living really mark a great improvement over a nursing home, or has the industry simply hired better interior designers? Are nursing homes as bad as people fear, or is that an out-moded stereotype ( ' ,  固定 看法 )? Can doing one's homework really steer families to the best places? It is genuinely hard to know.
